card.text: Flying You control each opponent during your turn. Creatures you don't control block each combat if able.

card.name: Huma of Radiant Flames
card.text: Flying Whenever Huma of Radiant Flames is exiled to pay a cost, for as long as it remains exiled you may cast it. (This includes additional costs like collect backing.)

card.name: Legion of Infinite Maws
card.text: Retinue — X 1/1s (When this enters, create the listed red Army tokens. They attack and block together and with this if able.) Creatures in Legion of Infinite Maws's retinue are Hydra Armies and have "Whenever this creature is dealt damage, sacrifice it and create two tokens that are copies of it in the same retinue."

card.name: Feather of All Paths
card.text: Feather of All Paths can only dynamize once each turn. Feather of All Paths has all activated abilities of other artifacts you control with mana value 1 or greater. {2}{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Dynamize. Activate only once each turn. (Activate any number of this artifact's other abilities without paying their costs.)

card.name: Unearned Mercy
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Until your next turn, player's life totals can't change. All permanents you control phase out.

card.name: Marvels of Alkabah
card.text: Reveal the top card of your library until you reveal two land cards. Put them into your hand, then shuffle. An opponent may have each player put a land card from their hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Revelation in Ruin
card.text: Return all nonland permanents to their owner's hand. Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: The Young Proselyte
card.text: When The Young Proselyte dies, you may search your library for a red or white planeswalker card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Whenever you cast a planeswalker spell, you may exile The Young Proselyte from your graveyard. If you do, you may activate the loyalty abilities of that planeswalker twice this turn rather than only once.

card.name: Fall of the Tyrant
card.text: Once each turn, when a creature you control dies, you may reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card revealed this way onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Grove of the Sherdal
card.text: Token creatures you control have flying and lifelink. {1}{W}: Exile target nontoken creature you control. Create a tapped token that's a copy of it.

card.name: Subdue Undeath
card.text: Exile up to one target creature or planeswalker and all tokens in that creature's retinue.

card.name: Seizure of Atashvar
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of colors that spell is. You may play cards exiled this way until you exile another card with Seizure of Atashvar.

card.name: Golna, Shah
card.text: Vigilance At the beginning of your end step, you may collect backing X. (For X colors, tap an untapped creature you control of that color or exile a card of that color from your graveyard.) Whenever you collect backing, you may return a card from your graveyard with mana value less than or equal to the number of colors that were backed to your hand.

card.name: Soli, the First Great Satrapy
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Grandeur — Satrapies you control have "{T}, Discard a card that shares a name with this land: Search your library for a Satrapy card that doesn't share a name with a land you control, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle."

card.name: Reclaimed Ruins
card.text: Reclaimed Ruins enters tapped. When it does, choose a color. Satrapies you control have "{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color."

card.name: Satrapy G5L
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Wizard G5L
card.text: Prowess

card.name: Warrior G5L
card.text: Haste

card.name: Treasure G5L
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Khul-Kata, Tomb Colossus
card.text: Indestructible, lifelink Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, choose one — • You may cast a spell from your hand without paying its mana cost. You lose life equal to its mana cost. • You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Discordance
card.text: Flying If a creature would die, merge that creature under Discordance instead. They gain that card's activated and triggered abilities. Discordance gets +1/+1 for each card merged with it.

card.name: Skycrested Roc
card.text: Flash Flying When Skycrested Roc enters, if you cast it from your hand, exile another target nonland permanent you control and target nonland permanent an opponent controls. For as long as they remain exiled, their owner may cast them for {1} rather than their mana cost.

card.name: Last of Marjavar
card.text: As long as you control exactly one creature, that creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {2}. Whenever a creature you control enters, if you control another creature, exile that creature. When you control no other creatures, if you don't control any other creatures, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. (If there are multiple cards exiled with this card, you return only one when a new creature leaves.)

card.name: Seat of the Faceless
card.text: Whenever you tap a land for {B}, add one mana of any color. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Draw two cards.

card.name: Ic, Seeker of Elsewheres
card.text: {1}{W}: Ic gets +0/+3 until end of turn. {U}: Ic gains flying and hexproof until end of turn. {B}: Ic gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn. {1}{R}: Ic gets +3/+0 until end of turn. {2}{G}: Ic fights up to one target creature. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Dynamize. (Activate any number of this artifact's other abilities without paying their costs.)

card.name: Dreamstep Assassin
card.text: Deathtouch The second spell you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast.

card.name: Bird G5L
card.text: Flying

card.name: Coronation of Shadows
card.text: Search your library for a card, exile it, then shuffle. It gains "Whenever you cast a spell, note each of its colors. Then if five different colors are noted this way, return this card to your hand."

card.name: Labor of Family
card.text: Choose one — • If you control four or more creatures, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. • Create a tapped 2/2 red Noble creature token.

card.name: Labor of Wit
card.text: Choose one — • If you have seven or more cards in hand, take an extra turn after this one. Exile Labor of Wit. • Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

card.name: Labor of Loyalty
card.text: Choose one — • If there are ten or more creature cards in your graveyard, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. • Create a 4/4 green Horror creature token. Mill three cards. You lose 3 life.

card.name: Labor of Life
card.text: Choose one — • If you have no cards in hand, Labor of Life deals 5 damage to any target. • Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

card.name: Labor of Mercy
card.text: Choose one — • If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, search your library for a green creature card with mana value 4, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle • Create three 1/1 black Assassin creature tokens with deathtouch.

card.name: Dragon G5L
card.text: Flying

card.name: Assassin G5L
card.text: Deathtouch
